.. image:: _static/logo-white.svg

Project Eden
=========================================================

.. container:: .large

   Project Eden is an extensive library and database on the cities of the United States.

.. container:: .buttons

   `Docs <getting_started.html>`_
   `GitHub <https://github.com/davidkastner/eden>`_
